other_tests.findings: There are small bilateral pleural effusions, multiple large calculi within the gallbladder, no gallbladder wall thickening, no focal liver lesions, a 13 x 13 mm enhancing mass arising exophytically from the ampulla, a normal caliber CBD containing a plastic stent, normal pancreatic duct caliber, diffuse fatty replacement of the pancreatic parenchyma, two 9-mm right parapelvic cysts, a 9-mm lower pole simple cyst in the left kidney, both adrenal glands normal.
